00128       template<class PtrType = TeleoReactor *> 
00129       struct reactor_id_traits {
00130        typedef PtrType base_type;
00131        typedef utils::Symbol id_type;
00132        
00147        static id_type const &get_id(base_type r) {
00148          return r->getName();
00149        }
00150       }; // TREX::transaction::details::reactor_id_traits
00151 
00152       typedef reactor_id_traits<>::base_type reactor_id;
